Dashboard.title: The AI Foundry
Dashboard.subtitle: Designing the future with Generative AI—where raw algorithms transform into human-centric solutions.

jobpang.title: JobPang AI Orchestrator
jobpang.description: An autonomous, deterministic, and scalable AI infrastructure that orchestrates the entire career development lifecycle—from diagnostics to strategy.
jobpang.impact: Streamlines the recruitment funnel by providing instant, objective candidate analysis, resulting in higher quality matches without manual screening fatigue.
jobpang.longDescription: JobPang is the 'Brain' behind the next-generation Career Coaching platform. It is not a chatbot—it is an Enterprise AI Orchestrator that automates the work of a senior headhunter. It performs deep diagnostics on Resumes, drafts persuasive Cover Letters, and acts as a deterministic mentor to guide users through their career journey without hallucination.

orchestration.title: Multi-Agent Protocol
orchestration.desc: Orchestrates 3 specialized LLM agents to review, rewrite, and strategize applications in parallel.

diagnosis.title: Deep Resume Audit
diagnosis.desc: Scans resumes for ATS compatibility, keyword density, and narrative strength with executive-level feedback.

screenshots.s1: Smart Resume Editor: AI detects errors and suggests spelling and style improvements
screenshots.s2: Detailed Matching Report: Evaluates candidate-JD fit across 3 dimensions (Culture Fit, Requirements, Experience)
screenshots.s3: Visual Resume Diagnostics: Chart analyzing 7 criteria and detailed requirement assessment
screenshots.s4: Overview Dashboard: 4-step process and multi-dimensional analysis by Personality Type (Paladin - Grade A)
screenshots.s5: Community Forum: Share experiences, Q&A on resumes, interviews and recruitment preparation
screenshots.s6: Career Profile Management: Edit Career Documents with AI-powered optimization suggestions

scanner.comment: Good technical depth, but fails to demonstrate business ROI. Suggest rewriting 'Project X' with STAR method.

terminal.step4: >> DETECTED: Lack of quantifiable metrics in 'Project A'
terminal.step5: >> OUTPUT: Structured JSON Feedback + Improvement Plan

s1.title: Democratize Career Growth
s1.desc: Launch free diagnostic tools to help 10,000 job seekers overcome ATS barriers and understand their market value.

s2.title: Meritocracy Engine
s2.desc: Eliminate hiring bias through blind AI interview agents that highlight potential over pedigree, partnering with progressive enterprises.

s3.title: Social Mobility
s3.desc: Establish a decentralized talent network where skills—not geography or background—determine life-changing opportunities.

monthler.title: Monthler AI Travel
monthler.description: Autonomous travel planning agent for complex itineraries.
monthler.impact: Transforms the chaos of travel planning into a seamless experience, handling complex logistics so travelers can simply enjoy the journey.
monthler.longDescription: Monthler redefines travel planning by using autonomous agents to scan thousands of data points—flights, hotels, weather, local events—to construct the perfect hyper-personalized itinerary in seconds.

security.title: Digital Local Guide
security.desc: RAG engine suggests authentic local experiences, avoiding tourist traps.

cost.title: Auto-Scheduler
cost.desc: Automatically generates day-by-day itineraries with optimal routes and real-time budget estimation.

terminal.step1: >> USER: 'Plan a 2-day food tour in Danang under $100'

scanner.comment: Logical flow established. Travel times minimized. Budget utilization: $85 (Safe).

s1.title: Reviving Local Economies
s1.desc: Prioritize 'mom-and-pop' shops and hidden local gems in recommendation algorithms to redirect tourism revenue to local communities.

s2.title: Sustainable Tourism Protocol
s2.desc: Integrate carbon footprint tracking and eco-friendly route optimization to minimize the environmental impact of travel.

s3.title: Cultural Bridge AI
s3.desc: Deploy real-time cultural translation agents that explain local customs and history, fostering deep cross-cultural empathy.

screenshots.s1: Conversation Starter: System suggests smart questions and quick tags to explore travel
screenshots.s2: Preference Refinement: AI recommends and displays matching programs based on preferences
screenshots.s3: Itinerary Building: Select attractions and view detailed information for each location
screenshots.s4: Voucher Details: Display daily itinerary with recommendations and complete information

genai-poc.title: GenAI Multi-Modal Studio
genai-poc.description: All-in-one playground for Text, Image, Audio, and Vision generation. A full-stack SaaS blueprint.
genai-poc.impact: Eliminates the complexity of building multi-modal infrastructure from scratch, offering a battle-tested blueprint for rapid AI product development.
genai-poc.longDescription: The Swiss Army Knife of AI. This project demonstrates a complete SaaS architecture integrating the 'Big Four' modalities: Text, Image, Audio, and Vision. It features a modern Next.js frontend coupled with a powerful NestJS processing backend.

multimodal.title: 4-Dimensional GenAI
multimodal.desc: Seamlessly switch between generating DALL-E 3 images, Whisper transcription, and GPT-4 writing.

saas.title: SaaS Architecture
saas.desc: Production-ready structure with Auth, Dashboard, and Marketing pages pre-configured.

terminal.step3: >> TEXT: Summarizing transcript to Image Prompt...
terminal.step5: >> FINISHED: Assets uploaded to S3. URL generated.

scanner.comment: Audio transcribed. Summary generated. Image rendered. Workflow complete.

s1.title: AI Literacy for All
s1.desc: Open-source the core generation modules to lower the barrier of entry for non-technical creators in developing nations.

s2.title: Ethical AI Watermarking
s2.desc: Implement immutable C2PA content credentials to fight misinformation and protect artist attribution in the generative age.

s3.title: Human-AI Co-Creativity
s3.desc: Shift focus from 'AI replacing experts' to 'AI amplifying human expression', enabling a new renaissance of digital art.

screenshots.s1: Unified Dashboard: Multi-modal Quick Creation, trending Templates and Community Showcase
screenshots.s2: AI Writer Studio: Select templates by category (Social Media, Blog, Marketing...) to create content
screenshots.s3: Text Generation: Enter prompt and receive content results with hooks, hashtags based on template
screenshots.s4: Image Generator: Generate images from prompts with Architectural Design template and resolution adjustment
screenshots.s5: Audio Transcription: Upload audio file and receive accurate text transcription
screenshots.s6: Vision Analysis: AI analyzes and explains image content in detail

eat-what.title: WhatEat AI Nutritionist
eat-what.description: Smart nutrition tracker that uses AI Vision to analyze meals, calculate calories, and gamify healthy eating habits.
eat-what.impact: Empowers users to build sustainable eating habits through instant visual awareness and gamified positive reinforcement, rather than strict calorie counting.
eat-what.longDescription: WhatEat transforms nutrition tracking from a chore into a lifestyle. Acting as a proactive AI Nutritionist, it uses advanced computer vision to decode complex meals into actionable data instantly. The platform drives engagement not through guilt, but through gamified progress, social quests, and positive reinforcement.

ai_nutrition.title: AI Food Scanner
ai_nutrition.desc: Instantly identifies dishes and estimates portion sizes using multi-modal AI.

gamification.title: Habit Building
gamification.desc: RPG-like progression system with Daily Quests, Streaks, and Leaderboards.

scanner.comment: Good protein balance. Sodium slightly high. Suggest drinking water.

s1.title: Fighting Hidden Hunger
s1.desc: Analyze micro-nutrient deficiencies in user diets to combat 'hidden hunger' in urban populations through smart suggestions.

s2.title: Preventative Health Shield
s2.desc: Partner with local clinics to identify early warning signs of lifestyle diseases (diabetes, obesity) via long-term dietary trend analysis.

s3.title: Farm-to-Fork Transparency
s3.desc: Connect users directly with sustainable local food sources, promoting organic produce and reducing food supply chain waste.

screenshots.s1: Login Screen: Welcome interface with 'What to Eat?' branding
screenshots.s2: Analysis Interface: Choose AI scan or manual search to log meals
screenshots.s3: AI Processing: Meal analysis screen with progress bar and real-time calorie estimation
screenshots.s4: Nutrition Dashboard: Calorie overview and detailed macro nutrients breakdown by percentage
screenshots.s5: Meal Details: View nutritional breakdown of each ingredient in the meal
screenshots.s6: Nutrition History: Calendar tracking with overview metrics (meals, avg score, calories, protein)

lenomand.title: Lenormand AI Oracle
lenomand.description: A spiritual spiritual companion blending 19th-century cartomancy with modern AI personas to provide actionable life guidance.
lenomand.impact: Preserves the nuanced art of tarot reading by combining traditional cartomancy logic with the empathetic reasoning of modern AI.
lenomand.longDescription: Lenormand AI is where heritage meets high-tech. It re-engineers the 19th-century 'Petit Lenormand' system into a dynamic digital oracle. Instead of cold, randomized outputs, it employs sophisticated Reader Personas—AI agents calibrated with distinct psychological profiles—to interpret card spreads with human-like nuance and empathy.

personalities.title: Reader Personas
personalities.desc: Choose your reader: From the strict 'Madame Iris' to the empathetic 'Ms. Linh'.

pairing.title: Logic Pairing
pairing.desc: AI interprets the unique interaction between Subject and Modifier cards.

terminal.step1: >> USER: 'Will I get the job?' | Context: Career
terminal.step5: >> OUTPUT: 'Success comes, but watch for fine print.'

scanner.comment: The Sun card illuminates the Letter. Good news is imminent.

s1.title: Digital Folklore Library
s1.desc: Archive and train personalized models on dying indigenous divination methods to preserve cultural heritage for future generations.

s2.title: Therapeutic AI Companion
s2.desc: Evolve the Oracle into a mental wellness checkpoint, identifying signs of user distress and offering gentle, grounded guidance.

s3.title: Collective Consciousness
s3.desc: Anonymized sentiment analysis of global user queries to generate 'spiritual weather reports' reflecting the emotional state of the world.

screenshots.s1: Topic Selection: Welcome screen with divination options (fortune, love, career...)
screenshots.s2: Card Selection: Card drawing interface with deck and topic-related question prompts
screenshots.s3: Reading Results: Display drawn cards and detailed interpretation of combined meanings
screenshots.s4: Card Details: Popup with in-depth explanation of individual card (The Dog - Loyalty, long-term relationships)
screenshots.s5: Topic Categories: Select area of interest for reading (Health, Marriage, Career...)
screenshots.s6: Reading History: Review past readings with complete analysis organized by tabs

edtech.title: AI Gradix Assistant
edtech.description: Comprehensive teaching platform that automates grading and lesson planning, freeing up 90% of teachers' administrative time.
edtech.impact: Liberates educators from the repetitive burden of grading, allowing them to redirect their energy toward mentorship and personalized student support.
edtech.longDescription: AI Gradix redefines the educational workflow. It serves as an tireless Teaching Assistant that fuses OCR with Generative AI to understand student handwriting and logic. By automating the mechanical aspects of grading and lesson planning, it returns the most valuable asset to teachers: time for face-to-face mentorship.

grading.title: Smart Grading
grading.desc: Hybrid logic (OCR + AI) to grade exams with near 100% accuracy.

assistant.title: Lesson Architect
assistant.desc: Generates 5512-standard lesson plans and slides from simple topics.

scanner.comment: 30 papers graded in 45 seconds. Mean score: 7.8

s1.title: Closing the Resource Gap
s1.desc: Provide rural schools with Ivy-league standard lesson planning and grading tools, leveling the playing field for underprivileged students.

s2.title: No Student Left Behind
s2.desc: Detect learning disabilities and gaps early through pattern analysis, suggesting personalized remedial content automatically.

s3.title: The Socratic Teacher
s3.desc: Shift AI from 'grader' to 'tutor', engaging students in Socratic dialogue to foster critical thinking rather than rote memorization.

screenshots.s1: Module Dashboard: Overview of features (Class Management, Grade Analytics, AI Grading...)
screenshots.s2: AI Grading Module: Grading options (multiple choice, essay for middle/high school, math problems)
screenshots.s3: Analytics Dashboard: Class metrics, grade distribution charts and student classification
screenshots.s4: Exam Management: View student profiles and multiple-choice questions with scores
screenshots.s5: AI Lesson Planner: Word/Slide editor with AI assistant for generating lesson content
screenshots.s6: Exam Bank: List of exams with content preview and detailed questions
